1: This class comprises the immaterial realisations of individual works at a particular time that are regarded as a complete whole
2: Catalogue Statement Cette classe permet de decrire lorsqu'elles existent les references de catalogue de l'oeuvre musicale Par catalogue on comprend tous les catalogues thematiques a proprement parler donc a l'exclusion des numeros d'opus ainsi que les classifications specifiques telles que WoO ou AnhSelon le niveau de granularite initial elle est decrite par une simple chaine de caracteres ou par les objets symboliques M10 Catalogue Name et M11 Catalogue Number qui la composent La classe M10 Catalogue Name peutetre documentee via la propriete p70i is documented in This class comprises sequences signs nature  either meaningful  used used refer identify specific instance class within certain context
3: This class comprises real persons who live or are assumed to have lived
4: This class comprises works that are realised by one and only one self-contained expression, i
5: This class comprises works that have more than one work as members
6: Opus Statement This class comprises sequences signs nature  either meaningful  used used refer identify specific instance class within certain context
7: Casting Cette classe permet de decrire les << medium of performance >> d'une oeuvre c'estadire les instruments machines executants autres que musiciens danseurs acteurs recitants... pour lesquels l'oeuvre a ete composee Elle decrit donc l'intention du compositeur M6 Casting est une << classe chapeau >> qui represente la globalite de la distribution instrumentale etou vocale Le detail de cette distribution est decrit via la classe M23 Casting DetailDans le cas de versions alternatives on donnera deux M6 Casting differents pour la meme expression This class comprises documented plans execution actions order achieve result specific quality  form contents
8: Casting Detail Cette classe decrit un detail de la distribution prevue par le compositeur par exemple une sonate pour violon et piano est decrite par deux << composantes >> M23 qui sont le violon et le piano Elle est donc obligatoirement associee a la classe M6 Intended Casting dont elle detaille les composantes Ces composantes comprennent notamment le ou les medium of performance prevus par le compositeur l'eventuel role soliste du medium of performance le personnage interprete par exemple dans un opera la tessiture precise This class comprises documented plans execution actions order achieve result specific quality  form contents
9: Medium of performance This class comprises concepts denoted terms thesauri controlled vocabularies used characterize classify instances CRM classes
10: This class comprises the activities of publishing
11: This class comprises activities through which an Agency declares (implicitly or explicitly) that a given instance of F2 Expression is representative for a given F15 Complex Work, i
12: This class comprises activities that result in instances of F2 Expression coming into existence
13: This class comprises abstract temporal extents, in the sense of Galilean physics, having a beginning, an end and a duration
14: This class comprises actions intentionally carried out by instances of E39 Actor that result in changes of state in the cultural, social, or physical systems documented
15: This class comprises sets of directions to which individual performances of theatrical, choreographic, or musical works and their combinations should conform
16: This class comprises activities that follow the directions of a performance plan, such as a theatrical play, an expression of a choreographic work or a musical work; i
18: This class comprises complete sets of signs present in publications, reflecting publishers’ final decisions as to both content and layout of the publications
19: This class comprises works that have been planned to result in a manifestation product type and that pertain to the rendering of expressions from other works
20: This class comprises sets of coherent phenomena or cultural manifestations bounded in time and space
21: Genre This class comprises concepts denoted terms thesauri controlled vocabularies used characterize classify instances CRM classes
22: Key Cette classe decrit la tonalite de l'oeuvreLes tonalites sont souvent listees sous forme de referentiels multilingues c'est pourquoi la classe M4 Key est liee a la classe M7 Linguistic Appellation This class comprises concepts denoted terms thesauri controlled vocabularies used characterize classify instances CRM classes
